snippet: M.L.B. Commissioner Bud Selig made a rare visit to the home of the Oakland A’s, sitting for his first news conference since his primary deputy, Rob Manfred, was elected to replace him.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Major League Baseball Commissioner Bud Selig makes rare, quick visit to home of Oakland A's, and addresses both complaints about tedious play and team's decrepit ballpark, O.co Coliseum, during news conference; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: M.L.B. Commissioner Bud Selig made a rare visit to the home of the Oakland A’s, sitting for his first news conference since his primary deputy, Rob Manfred, was elected to replace him.

headline.main: Selig Addresses Tedious Play and Oakland’s Decrepit Park
headline.print_headline: Selig Addresses Tedious Play and Oakland’s Decrepit Park
